TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FederatedPassiveSecurityTokenServiceOperations extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝通常由被動式同盟安全性權杖服務所執行之作業的公用程式類別。

span.span: A utility class that encapsulates the operations typically performed by a Federated Passive Security Token Service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當實作被動的安全性權杖服務 (STS)，呼叫您的程式碼後置以叫用您自訂的 STS，以處理傳入的執行個體從這個類別所公開的靜態方法的 WS-同盟要求訊息。When implementing a passive security token service (STS), call the static methods exposed by this class from your code-behind to invoke an instance of your custom STS to process an incoming WS-Federation request message. 您可以實作自訂 STS 由衍生自類別。You implement a custom STS by deriving from the class. ## Examples 使用本主題中的程式碼範例取自`Custom Token`範例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)，並包含能夠為 SWT 權杖的被動式 STS 實作。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範如何叫用自訂的被動式 STS，以處理 WS-同盟要求，藉由呼叫方法中的程式碼後置`default.aspx.cs`檔案。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 處理傳入的 WS-Federation 被動通訊協定要求。

span.span: Processes an incoming WS-Federation Passive Protocol request.

remarks.format: ## Examples 使用本主題中的程式碼範例取自`Custom Token`範例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)，並包含能夠為 SWT 權杖的被動式 STS 實作。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例 WIF 以及有關下載這些檔案的位置資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼示範如何叫用自訂的被動式 STS，以處理 WS-同盟要求，藉由呼叫方法中的程式碼後置`default.aspx.cs`檔案。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的這個一般用法是，程序所傳回的其中一個多載方法。This typical usage of this method is to process the returned from one of the overloaded methods.
